# CoreSpotlightActionTitle

**Property List Key**

The user-visible string that Spotlight displays as the title of the action.

## Action Properties

- **CoreSpotlightActionSymbolImage**: The name of a SF Symbol to display next to the action’s title.
- **CoreSpotlightActionIdentifier**: A string an app defines to identify the action.
